pages.text: There are 2 types of essence that you can harvest: Floral Essence and Earthen essence.$(br2) The essence can be crafted into blocks, and then changed back into its item form, for storage purposes.
Floral Essence will occasionally drop when blossoms are harvested from the trees in the Ornamental Forest.$(br2)It's used to make Floral Fortune Potions.
Earthen Essence can be found within ores and tree logs of all kinds.$(br2) It is a very rare item that is used for making the powerful potion, Gatherer's Glee.
